title: Establishes the mature worker business initiative within the state office of the aging to encourage businesses to recruit, retain and retrain mature workers
summary: Establishes the mature worker business initiative within the state office for the aging to encourage businesses to recruit, retain and retrain mature workers; describes the general powers and duties of the mature worker business initiative council.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law and the economic development law, in relation to establishing the mature worker business initiative
